data.persona: I have a wonderful hat.  My tunic is of superb fabric.  My sword is the finest.
data.description:
You are in the Cottage.
The small cottage was white with two, shuttered windows. It was in the unique shape of a circle and was built of plaster. Smoke billowed from the chimney.
There's a chimney, a dinner table, and a shuttered windows here.
The peasant is here.

You are carrying a coin, and wearing a hats.

data.short_motivation: I want to impress the peasant with a magic trick.
data.mid_motivation: I want the peasant to tell all his friends about my magic show I'm putting together.
data.long_motivation: I want to become the most famous magician in the kingdom, so I can be more than just a man with nice clothes and nice hats.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: use a coin with my hat to practice my magic trick.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: follow the peasant to the back of the cottage and strike up a conversation.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the coin and prepare to place it inside my hat.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield a magic spell to make the coin disappear from inside the hat.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield a magic spell to make the coin reappear in the peasant's hand.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give the coin to the peasant as payment for the task of telling everyone about my new magic show that I am working on.
